title: Update Splash Screen name to “GALAXY INTERNET” and add galaxy image background behind the name

requirements.text: Update the splash/intro screen company name text in `frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx` to display exactly: "GALAXY INTERNET" (replace the current "Star Maharashtra Galaxy Internet" text).

quotes: font is ok but chnage into company name is GALAXY INTERNET

acceptanceCriteria: On app launch, the splash screen headline text reads exactly "GALAXY INTERNET".
No other branding text is shown in place of the company name on the splash screen.
Existing splash behaviors remain unchanged: auto-transition timing, fade-out, click/tap to skip, and reduced-motion support.

requirements.text: Add a galaxy-themed background image behind the splash screen company name area (the text block containing the "GALAXY INTERNET" headline), using a static frontend asset under `frontend/public/assets/generated/`, and style it so the headline remains readable with sufficient contrast across breakpoints.

quotes: background of name is galaxy image

acceptanceCriteria: A galaxy image is used as a background behind the company-name area (not just a flat gradient).
The "GALAXY INTERNET" text remains clearly legible on top of the galaxy image on mobile and desktop.
Reduced-motion mode still shows a minimal/non-animated variant and still transitions quickly (no animation required for the galaxy image itself).
The galaxy background image is served as a static asset from `frontend/public/assets/generated/` and is not fetched from the backend.

requirements.text: Update splash screen styling (in `frontend/src/index.css` and/or Tailwind classes in `frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx`) to integrate the galaxy image background behind the name area while keeping existing splash layout, fade-out behavior, and Skip button behavior unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: The splash screen still fades out when completing.
The Skip button still works and remains readable/usable on top of the updated design.
No backend changes are introduced for this update.

constraints: Do not modify any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (read-only UI library components).
Do not serve images from the backend; all splash images must be static assets under `frontend/public/assets/generated/`.
Preserve existing splash behavior: auto-transition after a short delay, fade-out on completion, click/tap to skip, and reduced-motion accessibility support.
nonGoals: Do not change the Registration flow UI or Admin Panel UI as part of this request.
Do not add or modify backend/canister logic for the splash screen.
